stripped_text: When you install Customized Secretary reveal the top 5 cards of the stack. You may host any number of revealed programs from your stack on it. Shuffle your stack. click: Install a hosted program, paying all install costs.
text:
When you install Customized Secretary reveal the top 5 cards of the stack. You may host any number of revealed programs from your stack on it. Shuffle your stack.
[click]: Install a hosted program, paying all install costs.
title: Customized Secretary
